directions: Toss together the Red Delicious apples, Granny Smith apples, celery, raisins, and walnuts in a large bowl; set aside.  In a small bowl, whisk together the walnut oil, cider vinegar, salt, and pepper.  Toss the apples with the dressing to serve.
ingredients: 2 Red Delicious apples, cored and diced
2 Granny Smith apples, cored and diced
title: Waldorf Salad with Walnut Oil Vinaigrette
